alert.note: Alert for Mitchell; Osborne; Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 3:03AM CST until January 21 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 6 PM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations generally 2 to 4 inches. Winds will be light, averaging only around 10 MPH out of the northeast to north. * WHERE...Rooks, Osborne and Mitchell Counties. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 6 PM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Even at this close of time range, there is some modest uncertainty regarding snow totals, with at least minor adjustments likely in later forecasts. Although parts of the Advisory area could see snow start a bit earlier than 6 AM and last a bit later than 6 PM, the vast majority of accumulation should occur between 6 AM and 6 PM.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
